General.Description: Betterware de México, S.A.P.I. de C.V. operates as a direct-to-consumer selling company in the United Staes and Mexico. It operates through two segments, Home Organization Products; and Beauty and Personal Care Products. The Home Organization Products segment provides a portfolio of products comprising kitchen and food preservation; home solutions; bedroom; bathroom; laundry and cleaning; wellness; and technology and mobility. The Beauty and Personal Care Products segment offers fragrances, color, skin care products, and toiletries. It sells its products through catalogues, as well as distributes through a network of distributors, associates, leaders, and consultants to the end customers. The company is headquartered in Zapopan, Mexico. Betterware de México, S.A.P.I. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Campalier S.A. de C.V.
General.Address: Luis Enrique Williams 549, Zapopan, JA, Mexico, 45145
